meanings.definition: The light reflected from the moon.
meanings.sent1: The night was bright with the moonshines.
meanings.sent2: I love to walk under the moonshines.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the moonshines on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as the moonshines.
meanings.sent5: The lake sparkled under the gentle moonshines.

meanings.sent1: He brewed his own moonshines in the basement.
meanings.sent2: Moonshines were popular during the Prohibition era.
meanings.sent3: The party got wild after someone brought out the moonshines.
meanings.sent4: The moonshines flowed freely at the secret gathering.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the illegal moonshines filled the room.
